dmca.title: "Alargamiento Pene" Site Allegedly Copied Wholesale (#1)
dmca.body:
From: [private]
To: Google
Date: 30/05/02 Time: 03:36:22 a.m.
Page 1 of 2

May 30, 2002

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Formal Notification of Copyright Infringement under DMCA

Currently, Google is providing links and ads to a web pages which are infringing my copyright.

These web pages (owned by the same person) are:

http://www.dificultades-sexuales.com 
http://www.penes-largos.com 
http://www.geocities.com/epucsdz/solucion.htm 
http://www.geocities.com/epucsdz/paginal.htm

(The last two URLs simply redirect to the first).

The material infringing the copyrighted work is accessible through Google with the following way:

Google Directory

Category: World > Espanol > Paises > America > Estados Unidos > Economia y negocios > Compras 
Listing: Ep Ucsd - http://www.geocities.com/epucsdz/solucion.htm

Category: World > Espanol > Compras > Salud > Urologia 
Listing; Agrande su pene - http://www.geocities.com/epucsdz/paginal.htm

Search Keywords:

eyaculacion precoz
eyaculacion
precoz
tamano del pene
tamano pene
ejercicios pene
ejercicios para el pene
agrandar el pene
agrandar pene
alargar el pene
alargar pene
alargamiento del pene
alargamiento de pene
alargamiento pene
agrandamiento del pene
agrandamiento de pene
agrandamiento pene

Infringing Web Pages:

www.geocities.com/epucsdz/solucion.htm 
www.geocities.com/epucsdz/paginal.htm 
www.penes-largos.com 
www.penes-largos.com/pagina1.htm 
www.dificultades-sexuales.com





<HR>
page 2 of 2


Also, the above web pages are part of an AdWords campaign with the same keywords.

These web sites owner has copied my web site layout, graphics and texts located at http://www.peneana.com, he has changed some colours and placed all my copyrighted works on his web pages without my autorization. According, his actions are in violation of United States copyright law and I request Google either remove or disable access to the web sites above detailed.

Please note that in the html source code of the web pages at http://www.penes-largos.com and http://www.dificultades-sexuales.com , you can view the text "Peneana.com" into the ALT tags of the logo image. This prove that these web sites owner has stolen my web pages and all my copyrighted work.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner (me), its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Since you have now been put on notice, you do now have actual knowledge that the material on your system is infringing. Failure to act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material strips you of the protections for OSPs provided by the DMCA.

I am not seeking to become involved in litigation, but I will take all necessary measures to protect my intellectual property rights. I presume that you would agree that we can resolve this amicably.

Sincerly yours,

[private]
Peneana.com 
http://www.peneana.com

Email: [private]

Phone: [private]
[private]
Buenos Aires - Argentina
